pullRequest.title: Use void future in client removeCommandHandlingAdapterInstance()
pullRequest.bodyText:
This reverts #1926 and makes the method behave according to the API spec again, returning a failed Future if the entry wasn't removed.
Motivated by discussion here: #2251 (comment).

nodes.bodyText: the JavaDoc should be adapted as well ...

commit.message:
Use void future in client removeCommandHandlingAdapterInstance().

This reverts #1926 and makes the method behave according to
the API spec again, returning a failed Future if the entry
wasn't removed.

Signed-off-by: Carsten Lohmann <carsten.lohmann@bosch.io>
